snippet.title: Blackguards 2 - Official Trailer - English
snippet.description:
Blackguards 2 is the sequel of the turn-based strategy-RPG and will deliver more hexfield battles and an even grittier story filled with violence and crime. 

Please find more information about the game here:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/314830

http://www.blackguards.com

www.daedalic.de/en
www.facebook.com/daedalic
